recommended_action:
To enable the Customer Lockbox feature, use the Microsoft 365 Admin Portal:
1. Browse to the Microsoft 365 admin center.
2. Under Settings choose Security & privacy.
3. Click Edit next to Customer Lockbox.
4. Click the box next to Require approval for all data access requests to enable the feature and then click Save.
rationale: Enabling this feature protects your data against data spillage and exfiltration.

CustomerLockboxEnabled.errorMessage: Organization does not have customer kockbox enabled.
